title: Innovating Learning Attitudes: Transforming Failure into Growth

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic psychological concepts (e.g., growth mindset)
context.additional_context: Online collaborative learning environment combining social science theories with real-life case studies.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain common misconceptions related to a growth mindset with over 80% accuracy.
After conducting peer feedback at least three times, learners demonstrate a 40% or greater improvement in failure reinterpretation skills.
Learners achieve over 75% engagement in the predict-explain cycle activity and can explain the connection between mistakes and learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
